## Interactive Map Data Product Assignment
This assignment will create a web based interactive map using Leaflet.

## Leaflet Map of London 
###This map includes
 - Map of the London England area
 - Icons indicating some points of interest within the city
 - Legend distinguishing between icons

## Interactive London Map
```{r London, echo = FALSE,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
df <- data.frame(lat =c(51.509865,51.508530,51.501476,51.503399),
                 lng = c(-0.118092,-0.076132,-0.140634,-0.119519),
                 popu = c("Central London","Tower of London",
                          "Buckingham Palace","London Eye"),
                 clr =c("blue","green","red","orange"))
#df <- data.frame(lat = runif(30, min = 51.45, max = 51.55),
#                 lng = runif(30, min = -0.2, max = 0.2))

df %>% 
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addCircleMarkers(popup=df$popu,color=df$clr,radius=10) %>%
  addLegend(labels = c("CentralL","Tower","Palace","Eye"), colors = df$clr)
```
